name: Box Mania (lizardman06)
description:
This is my first game using a real game engine!

Controls player 1:

WAD to Move 

S to place box

Space to attack/make box immovable.

Controls player 2:

Arrow keys to move to Move 

Down Arrow to place box

Mouse button to attack/make box immovable.

If you make steps at the top of the map there is a level with enemy mobs and bosses
